About Us

We love data. BetaEpsilon connects together the entire organization through a data driven decision framework using a common analytical fabric. Beta Epsilon delivers advanced data science, analytics and visual discovery solutions for companies looking to improve business performance, drive innovation and creating a data driven culture.

BetaEpsilon looks deeper into the data and can help management to gain insight into their business processes, make better decisions, predict future opportunities, and take strategic actions.

Our Awesome Team

Bhawani Shankar

Bhawani Shankar is a passionate entrepreneur and leader with over 7 years of high-tech experience. His latest venture, BetaEpsilon was founded in 2017 with the mission to disrupt the business intelligence space and monetize Data science & Analytics. Prior to BetaEpsilon, Bhawani was Founder and CEO of XYZ, ABC and LMN. Bhawani Shankar Holds B.Tech. Degree in Industrial & Systems Engineering from IIT Kharagpur.

Mohit Anand

Mohit turns business ideas into data products, co-founding BetaEpsilon and leading the effort to build multipurpose BI platform driven by data Science and analytics. Mohit has been working in analytics & data science for more than 8 years. He has exposure of working in multiple geographies (India, South East Asia , Europe) both in fortune 500 companies like () and also as an independent consultant. Mohit’s priorities at BetaEpsilon include solving customer business problem using data science & Analytics, innovating the platform along customer needs, and leading the growing Data Science & Analytics team. Mohit holds B.Tech. Degree from IIT Kharagpur.

Darshika Kesarwani

Darshika most recently served as IT Analyst for creating data visualization technology at TCS. She also served as Sr. Software Engineer at Sopra Steria Group, Software Engineering at HCL Technologies. Darshika has 7 years experience in working on latest software tools & Technologies for solving data related problems. Darshika’s priorities at BetaEpsilon include continued alignment of business and technology goals and providing cutting edge technology solution for customer needs and and leading the growing engineering team
